name: Shohoj Pay
brief: A mern stack f-commerce team project.
bulletPoints: Manages two types of users merchant and personal. Got add money, Send Money, Request Money, Save Money, Merchant Pay, ECheck, Get Paid, Merchant to Merchant, and Merchant to Personal services with detailed statements. Dashboards for both users got admin panel with overall transaction summary, admin, and user management. Interactive settings page to update personal info.
Implemented Add Money, Send Money, Request Money, Save Money..
Handled transaction statements on the backend.
Implemented live notification.
Completed the admin panel (admin_Id: admin@gmail.com, password: 123456).
technologies: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, JsonWebToken, Stripe, React Router, Tailwind, Daisy UI, Redux Toolkit, Socket.io, etc.

name: Tooldo
bulletPoints: Interactive & functional dashboard panel for both admin and general users.
Order placement, stripe payment, and order cancelation for general users.
Register, login, social login, email verification, password reset, update profile.
Interactive my profile page to update personal info.
Products, orders, and role management for admin (admin_Id: admin@admin.com, password: 123456).
technologies: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, JsonWebToken, Stripe, React Router, React Query, Tailwind, Daisy UI, etc.

name: DentAid
